description:
OpenTelemetry service health dashboard. 
Instrument services with OpenTelemetry, send traces, metrics, and logs to Tempo, a Prometheus database like Mimir, and Loki, and visualize the health of these services with this dashboard.

panels.description:
HTTP Endpoints aggregation. Percentage of 5xx HTTP response status code.
https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/http/http-metrics/#metric-httpserverrequestduration

targets.expr: (sum without(http_response_status_code, error_type, instance) (rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$service_namespace/$service_name", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) * 100) / sum without(http_response_status_code, error_type, instance) (rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Error

panels.description:
gRPC Endpoints aggregation.
Percentage of response with gRPC status code != 0.
https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/rpc/rpc-metrics/#metric-rpcserverduration
panels.title: Error

panels.description:
Inbound HTTP operations of the service (aka HTTP endpoints).
https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/http/http-metrics/#metric-httpserverrequestduration

targets.expr:
(
        sum by (operation) (
            label_join(
                rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]),
                "operation",
                " ",
                "http_request_method",
                "http_route"
            )
        )
     / 
        sum by (operation) (
            label_join(
                rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "operation",
                " ",
                "http_request_method",
                "http_route"
            )
        )
    ) or (0 * 
        sum by (operation) (
            label_join(
                rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "operation",
                " ",
                "http_request_method",
                "http_route"
            )
        )
    )

panels.title: HTTP Operations

panels.description:
Inbound gRPC operations of the service (aka gRPC endpoints).
Specific to gRPC vs. other RPC technologies due to the usage of the rpc.grpc.status_code
https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/rpc/rpc-metrics/#metric-rpcserverduration

targets.expr:
(
        sum by (operation) (
            label_join(
                rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name", rpc_grpc_status_code!="0"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "operation",
                "/",
                "rpc_service",
                "rpc_method"
            )
        )
     / 
        sum by (operation) (
            label_join(
                rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "operation",
                "/",
                "rpc_service",
                "rpc_method"
            )
        )
    ) or (0 * 
        sum by (operation) (
            label_join(
                rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "operation",
                "/",
                "rpc_service",
                "rpc_method"
            )
        )
    )

panels.title: gRPC Operations

panels.description:
HTTP calls made by the service. Broken done by remote server.address and by http.request.method
https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/http/http-metrics/#metric-httpclientrequestduration

targets.expr:
(
        sum by (outbound_service) (
            label_join(
                rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]),
                "outbound_service",
                " ",
                "server_address",
                "http_request_method",
                "url_template"
            )
        )
     / 
        sum by (outbound_service) (
            label_join(
                rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "outbound_service",
                " ",
                "server_address",
                "http_request_method",
                "url_template"
            )
        )
    ) or (0 * 
        sum by (outbound_service) (
            label_join(
                rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "outbound_service",
                " ",
                "server_address",
                "http_request_method",
                "url_template"
            )
        )
    )

panels.title: Outbound HTTP Services

panels.description:
DB calls made by the service.
https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/database/database-metrics/#metric-dbclientoperationduration

targets.expr:
(
        sum by (database) (
            label_join(
                rate(db_client_operation_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]),
                "database",
                "/",
                "server_address",
                "db_namespace"
            )
        )
     / 
        sum by (database) (
            label_join(
                rate(db_client_operation_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "database",
                "/",
                "server_address",
                "db_namespace"
            )
        )
    ) or (0 * 
        sum by (database) (
            label_join(
                rate(db_client_operation_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "database",
                "/",
                "server_address",
                "db_namespace"
            )
        )
    )

panels.title: Outbound Databases

panels.description:
gRPC calls made by the service.
Specific to gRPC vs other RPC technologies due to the usage of the grpc.status.code attribute.
https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/rpc/rpc-metrics/#rpc-client

targets.expr:
(
        sum by (outbound_service) (
            label_join(
                rate(rpc_client_duration_milliseconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]),
                "outbound_service",
                "/",
                "server_address",
                "rpc_service",
                "rpc_method"
            )
        )
     / 
        sum by (outbound_service) (
            label_join(
                rate(rpc_client_duration_milliseconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "outbound_service",
                "/",
                "server_address",
                "rpc_service",
                "rpc_method"
            )
        )
    ) or (0 * 
        sum by (outbound_service) (
            label_join(
                rate(rpc_client_duration_milliseconds_count{job=~"$service_namespace/$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]),
                "outbound_service",
                "/",
                "server_address",
                "rpc_service",
                "rpc_method"
            )
        )
    )

panels.title: Outbound gRPC Services

panels.description: Traces containing a span emitted by the service
For JVM based services like Java or Kotlin, the JVM metrics
panels.title: JVM

list.description: Values instrospected from traces, filtering on the selected service namespace..
list.label: service.name
list.name: service_name

title: OpenTelemetry Service
